title: The.Legend.of.Korra.S04E07.Reunion.720p.WEB-DL.DD5.1.H.264-YFN
description:
The Legend of Korra, Book 4: Balance - Chapter 7 (WEB-DL - 720p)
----------------------------------------------------------------

Avatar Korra, a headstrong, rebellious, feisty young woman who continually
challenges and breaks with tradition, is on her quest to become a fully
realized Avatar. In this story, the Avatar struggles to find balance
between tradition and modernity, the bending and non-bending world,
and within herself.

Produced by Nickelodeon Animation Studios.


Korra returns to Republic City and Team Avatar faces their first mission together
in three years when Prince Wu goes missing; Bolin and Varrick are on the lam.
